name: RTC Demo - Create Picklists External and tables

content.query:
IF EXISTS(
SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES 
where TABLE_NAME = 'Stg_1st_Road_Class' AND TABLE_SCHEMA = 'RTC')

    DROP TABLE [RTC].[Stg_1st_Road_Class];
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [RTC].[Stg_1st_Road_Class]
(
	 [code] NVARCHAR(10)  NOT NULL,
	 [label] VARCHAR(300)
)
WITH
(
	LOCATION = '/RTC/NonSensitive/DailyLoads/1st Road Class.csv',
	DATA_SOURCE = [RTC],
	FILE_FORMAT = [CCSV]
)CREATE TABLE [RTC].[1st_Road_Class] 
WITH
(

    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX,
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH([code])
)
AS 
SELECT * FROM [RTC].[Stg_1st_Road_Class]

IF EXISTS(
SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES 
where TABLE_NAME = 'Stg_Skidding_and_Overturning' AND TABLE_SCHEMA = 'RTC')

    DROP TABLE [RTC].[Stg_Skidding_and_Overturning];
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [RTC].[Stg_Skidding_and_Overturning]
(
	 [code] NVARCHAR(10)  NOT NULL,
	 [label] VARCHAR(300)
)
WITH
(
	LOCATION = '/RTC/NonSensitive/DailyLoads/Skidding and Overturning.csv',
	DATA_SOURCE = [RTC],
	FILE_FORMAT = [CCSV]
)CREATE TABLE [RTC].[Skidding_and_Overturning] 
WITH
(

    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX,
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH([code])
)
AS 
SELECT * FROM [RTC].[Stg_Skidding_and_Overturning]
